alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Chicot and central Washington Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 604 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake Village to near Gassoway. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Avon around 625 PM CDT. Greenville and Metcalfe around 630 PM CDT. Leland and Hollandale around 635 PM CDT. Estill around 640 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Arcola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi.
